title: 23: OBITCH speaking of bloat..
description:
OBITCH, Put on your necropants, and sit back and relax. This week we’re talking all things decomposition, and finally getting to know fuckass King Henry a little better. We’ve got some crazy obituaries, and of course some dumb.ass.criminalsssss!
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
Olive and June: oliveandjune.com/obit use code ‘obit’ for 20% off your first mani system! 
Hello Fresh: hellofresh.com/obit14 use code ‘obit14’ for up to 14 free meals AND 3 free gifts! 
Sources: 
https://www.crimeonline.com/2018/08/31/man-comes-forward-says-hes-missing-child-who-vanished-from-his-crib-32-years-ago/ https://www.verywellhealth.com/what-happens-to-my-body-right-after-i-die-1132498 https://www.aftermath.com/content/human-decomposition/ https://www.science.org.au/curious/decomposition https://www.newsbreak.com/news/2254645316135/drunk-man-hurled-pizza-box-in-cape-coral-bar https://biblehub.com/leviticus/20-21.htm https://www.history.com/news/queen-mary-i-bloody-mary-reformation https://study.com/learn/lesson/catherine-aragon-children-facts-death.html https://www.ranker.com/list/who-was-henry-viii/carly-silver  https://www.thevintagenews.com/2016/11/08/there-once-was-a-beard-tax-in-england-and-in-russia-those-who-payed-the-tax-were-given-a-token/#:~:text=In%201535%2C%20King%20Henry%20VIII%2C%20who%20sported%20a,pay%2C%20making%20facial%20hair%20a%20symbol%20of%20status https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_VIII#Death_and_burial https://www.tudorhistory.org/boleyn/ https://blog.hrp.org.uk/curators/wax-hearse-for-henry-viii-funeral/ https://www.biography.com/news/henry-viii-biography-facts https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rJ5G2VL8Vfo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=th4qjoIsKIs https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ewLpXw6uN28 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IFcrpSnS0RA&t=1464s https://www.ebaumsworld.com/videos/guy-kidnaps-himself/813302/ https://theweek.com/articles/459204/walter-white-isnt-first-fictional-character-obituary https://www.nytimes.com/2021/02/23/us/brandon-soules-fake-kidnapping.html https://abc11.com/arizona-man-fakes-kidnapping-brandon-soules-coolidge-police-department-false-report/10369420/
See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
